name: Orderly Health, Inc.
description: Developer of data management software designed to improve the accuracy of healthcare data. The company's software is a machine learning product that automatically identifies and repairs inaccuracies in healthcare provider directories, enabling all patients to have access to up-to-date, accurate information and reducing the cost and time burden on payers, plans, and administrators.
one_liner: Developer of data management software designed to improve the accuracy of healthcare data. The company's software is a machine learning product that automatically identifies and repairs inaccuracies in healthcare provider directories, enabling all patients to have access to up-to-date, accurate information and reducing the cost and time burden on payers, plans, and administrators.
industry: AI/Machine Learning, Data & Analytics, Health Tech
